title: Blackstone River Valley National Historical Park: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information           Physical Address           One Depot Square  Woonsocket, RI 02895                 Directions         One Depot Square, Woonsocket is located at the corner of Main Street and High Street, Woonsocket.   Directions Details           Operating Hours & Seasons         Blackstone River Valley National Historical Park Headquarters Currently, our park headquarters is in the Woonsocket Depot, at One Depot Square Woonsocket, RI.    Standard Hours    Sunday: Closed   Monday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM   Tuesday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM   Wednesday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM   Thursday: Sunrise - 5:00 PM   Friday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM   Saturday: Closed             Weather           Summer temperatures range from 56-83F. Fall temperatures range from 30-70F. Winter temperatures range from 20-45F. Spring temperatures range from 30-70F.         Fees & Passes     Entrance Fees:   Fees for Blackstone River Valley National Historical Park - $0.00 At this point, the Park Service does not charge any fees at the Blackstone River Valley NHP. However, some of our partner sites to charge fees, as these sites are run by private, non-profit organizations.          Visitor Centers              Â      Maypole braiding machine at Slater Mill   The Blackstone River Valley National Historical Park includes several sites across the Blackstone River Valley of Rhode Island and Massachusetts. They are:   Old Slater Mill National Historic Landmark District  Blackstone River State Park Ashton Historic District Slatersville Historic District  Whitinsville Historic District  Hopedale Village Historic District  Blackstone River and the tributaries of Blackstone River  Blackstone Canal  Please explore our website to discover  Operating Hours Fees and Reservations
